amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 109-347 to direct the Inspector General to refer any instances of misconduct or wrongdoing on a contract to the Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security or other appropriate official for the purpose of evaluating whether or not suspension or debarment of the contractor is warranted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
